competition_summary.context: Competition Many of our confectionery and salty snack brands enjoy wide consumer acceptance and are among the leading brands sold in the marketplace in North America and certain international markets.  We sell our brands in highly competitive markets with many other global multinational, national, regional and local firms.  Some of our competitors are large private companies, as well as large retailers, that have significant resources and substantial international operations.   Competition in ou
